modmenu.descriptionTranslation.my_totem_: Simple Fabric mod which replaces all totems with player dolls.

my-totem-doll.modmenu.option.mod_enabled: If enabled, all totems will be replaced with player dolls; if disabled, won't.
my-totem-doll.modmenu.option.debug_log_e: If enabled, additional info will be logged to console for debugging; if disabled, won't.
my-totem-doll.modmenu.option.scale.name: Scale
